channel.title: Quran – Rashid Azar's Weblog
channel.description: Don't document the program; program the document.

item.title: Techings of Quran
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: What Allah Wants us TO DO in Quran: Respect and honour all human beings irrespective of their religion, colour, race, sex, language, status, property, birth, profession/job and so on [Al-Qur’an-17/70] Talk straight, to the point, without any ambiguity or deception [Al-Qur’an-33/70] Choose best words to speak and say them in the best possible way [Al-Qur’an-17/53, … Continue reading Techings of Quran →
